Name: Money Makes Money
About the game: Use investment tools to create a wealthy future for yourself. Allocate your time and money wisely into a wide range of financial asset classes. Try different strategies to deal with changing poliitics, tax policies and the ups and downs of the markets. Will you live life as a pauper or become a multi millionaire? Starting age 10, during each year of your life, you decide how best to invest your time and money. There are many options to educate yourself and improve your employment prospects. Alternatively, become an entrepreneur and build a profitable business from scratch. Or become an investor in the many asset classes available to you. Money Makes Money covers almost every option in life an individual has to invest in or reduce spending on. However, the government does not allow us to make money without paying Tax....so there is a full set of tax liabilities you will have to pay each year and tax avoidance options. Supported Languages: English and German (Deutsche). Units Sold: 1,963
